short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter On3 forums posts to show only the highlights

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension highlights forum posts on On3 forums based on a set of configurable rules so that you can see just the highlights. On the options page, you can configure a minimum number of reactions and a whitelist of users. Any posts that are from a whitelisted user or meet the minimum number of reactions will be highlighted. There are different modes for how posts will be highlighted. From the options page or the popup, you can disable the app to pause highlighting and enable to resume.
